title: 'Open Feast' of lines, colors in upcoming US artist's show
text:
By Lin Qi | chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-10-25 14:26

Mandala in the Sky will be on show. [Photo/Courtesy of Eddie Martinez and Timothy Taylor, London]

Brooklyn-based artist Eddie Martinez explores in his works topics of pop culture, sports, art history and individual experiences.

His upcoming debut solo exhibition on the Chinese mainland, Open Feast, will provide audiences a gate to his world of art filled with energetic lines and colors, as well as a free-minded spiritual haven.

The exhibition will kick off on Nov 7 at the Yuz Museum in Shanghai, showing Martinez's drawings on paper and oil works on canvas, which feature his signature well-controlled use of lines and a bold palette to deliver a breath of life.
